ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] EBAY "Ripped Me Off"
ygData.msgSnippet: What item in question is this? If it s an EQ item, YOU pay the price for utilizing a third party to sell items from EQ. The act itself is both stupid and lame.
ygData.messageBody:
What item in question is this? If it's an EQ item, YOU
pay the price for utilizing a third party to sell
items from EQ. The act itself is both stupid and lame.


--- Beverly <beverlyreed2002@...> wrote:
> No wonder Ebay makes to much money. I list "ONE"
> item for sell
> thinking the price they say it is $15 and change and
> I get a bill for
> ("Non-Payment of $132.86 Balance on your eBay
> account"). These people
> go ripping other people off. I will never use their
> service again and
> I would hope other people don't end up in my
> situation! Sorry for
> venting but this is complete BS.
>
